mapper.select: select u.name, u.bio, u.head, count(p.user_id) n from Product p,User u where p.user_id = u.id group by p.user_id order by n desc limit 5;
mapper.update: update User set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, head = #{head}, address = #{address}, gender = #{gender}, website = #{website}, bio = #{bio} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select p.id, p.favorite_num, p.picture, p.name from product_like l,product p where l.product_id = p.id and l.user_id = #{id} order by l.create_time desc
